website_summaries.verdict: A high quality glass set that is the perfect size for enjoying a whiskey neat.
pros: Small 7-ounce glasses are the perfect size to enjoy whiskey neat
Bottom half of glass is covered in classic diamond design
Glass quality is clear with a lovely shine
Thick, heavy glasses are comfortable to hold and feel durable
cons: Glasses are a little too small for ice cubes or whiskey stones
